card_text: 2 monsters, except Tokens$NThis card gains these effects based on the number of monsters co-linked to this card.$N●1+: When a monster co-linked to this card battles your opponent's monster and inflicts battle damage to them: You can gain that much LP.$N●2: Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can target 2 face-up monsters you control; until the end of this turn, halve the ATK of 1 monster, and if you do, add that lost ATK to the other monster.
